name: Q2 Humanity
summary: he smash hit game “Q REMASTERED”, which became extremely popular amongst users in Japan in early 2023, is now coming back! "Q2 HUMANITY" is finally available as Early Access! In "Q2" the sequel to "Q1" you can play as a character yourself. You can fly, jump, run, draw, grab, throw, and so on.

name: Q2Jump
summary: Jump is a mod for Quake II where instead of plain deathmatch and killing, the idea is to jump around various jump maps in the fastest possible time. There are all sorts of different jumps you need to pull off, from double and triple jumps to circle and ladder jumps. Quake II's equivalent of DeFRaG.
